channel.title: Putting items on store
channel.description: ok when i try to put more than 6 items on the store i cant loggin :S and it crashes server if i a try a dragon2h[br][size=1]Posted at: September 20, 2006, 12:24:07 PM[/size][hr]bump

item.title: Putting items on store
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

[quote=“dbs0310836, post:4, topic:15479”][quote author=Itachi Uchiha link=topic=23071.msg259597#msg259597 date=1158793650]
is d2h in your item.cfg file?if it isnt add this to item.cfg

item = 7158	Dragon_2h_Sword	A_two-handed_dragon_sword.	88000.2105575155	88000.2105575155	132000.3495290539	-4	92	80	-4	0	0	0	0	-1	93	140	0

[/quote]

try that first, and NEVER EVER USE SPACES IN CFG FILES[/quote]i used tab but things messed up and it made it spaces :\

Read full topic
